channel.title: Trying to make a alter that recharges your prayer
channel.description: My project it to make a alter that doesnt give exp but makes your prayer to go up to make not the exp and i dont want spoon feeding i just want the way i might be able to make the skill go up not exp lol sorry i cant explain better its way too hard lol.

item.title: Trying to make a alter that recharges your prayer
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

here if you want.

if(objectIDz == 10638 || objectIDz == 409 || objectIDz == 411 || objectIDz == 4859){ if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { sendMessage("You already have full Prayer points."); } else { setAnimation(645); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); sendMessage("You recharge your Prayer points."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Trying to make a alter that recharges your prayer
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Leaked from some source, test it I guess. // lazy

case 409: setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); refreshSkills(); setAnimation(645); sendMessage("You recharge your prayer"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;

Read full topic

item.title: Trying to make a alter that recharges your prayer

Try altering the level, since I believe the XP deals with the bottom number, and its level is the top. Just like HP. Also try looking at eating food.
